data.text: Upa kha kese ah ranmaro, khawa rathuulla napa angnga malung masokpiro, halli khangdong ngaikha nanai ngai angnga,
numeisa upa ngaikha nanu ngai angnga, halli khangdoong numeisa ngaikha nasar angnga malung inthiangnga inloppuiro.
Sansik ah arei kaom Chuulmei ka-etak ngaikha kayaro.

Takkha chuulmeinu'n asa emakli atu ngai aom inchu, mansakhet ah inmani'n Pathian kajet chuonkha inmani insuungkhur khan thomasarasu, halli hiwa'n innu inpa ngai khat-um inpi inpu ngai chuontho maleiikirna eii, ajarchu hiwahi Pathian malungtaina eii.
Atheinuo ah kaom chuulmei khat-um tuteii sepa inthosik kaneimak ama'n, Pathian khabit ngamna ada ah, suunle zaan inchat omleiya Pathain niya Pathian in juosanna sik-ah aniya aom.
Takkha taksa hoina ah apum inpesuok chuulmeinu kha aring innum kathi a-ejei.
Hiwa indiknahi inmani diang peru, khawa e-inchu tuteii in inmani diang kadikmak noonkuung penunujei.

Takkha atu ka-ang in inmani in-u innai khat-um akathadoomma inmani insuungkhur mi ngaikha inensui theimak inchu, inmani'n inngam nakha inzootmak eii halli inmani ngaikha ka-ngamna makngai neek ah kathamak in eii.

Kum soomruk kalakheelmak chuulmei kha chuulmei eii tia leimaru, halli ama kha pasal inkhat diangbit inn kaleinei numeisa esik eii5:9: halli ama kha pasal inkhat diangbit inn kaleinei numeisa esik eii, emakli aruothar diang huoikajou.

halli ama kha akatha chuon katho sik-ah araming kasi erase, asa ngaikha katha ah kahong keiruoi, khuolmi ngaikha a-inna kadonzoot, aleiilaak Christian ngaidiang sepa katha kathothei, mikapoong ngai kasan, halli ama'n akatha chuon rakip ah apumtak kathozoot erase.
Takkha akadoong chuulmei ngaikha chuulmei eii tia leimaru; ajarchu inmani'n inmalungnga inn inhongneizoot phakhan, Christa diang makheiya inletsik eii.
Halli inmani'n mansakhet chonginkhit nakha inmakoi jarra kathamak in-ejei.
Inmani'n akadool inchuwa inn khat makheiya inn khat ah inlonbulla inom, takkha akadoolbit ema ah, rilmaksik chong inrilla inchuon inmin-et ah, mikarilthai khat-um chongriam karil inchuwa inom.
Khawajarra kei'n chuulmei kadoong ngaikha inn neisik hi kei'n kamanuom, sa neirasu, halli in innluo ngaikha boolrasu, khantho inlang eini ni-inhalpui ngai'n kathamak ah naril nasik ah amun pemui.
Tichu chuulmei lekkhat in Seitan nuk juinasik-ah inmalung inmaletsuojei.

Tichu atu ka-ang Christa nukkajui numeisa inna chuulmei inom inchu, ama'n chuulmei ngaikha ensui rase, halli inmani jarra koisuok ngaidiang poongna pemarasu, khawakha e-inchu sansik ah arei kaom chuulmei ngaiseng kha koisuok ngai'n sanna nei inte.
Chuonkatha katho upa lam kanakei ngai, khat-um akathadoomma kapoong tak ah Pathian chong karil li kanaminchu ngaikha, chan inni kha pesik ah rahoi kasuok in eii.
Tichu chong inthiang in aril, “Saang narakhool na-ah ni-inliingna saraatchal kha amur khuop maro” halli “Chuon katho ngai kha inchuon thoman nipesik suok.” Innidan 25:4; Matt 10:10; Luk 10:7
Mi inni emakli inni kheella sakhi narangaimaklai seng, upa inkhat chungnga kathamak inheichoi kha leimaru.
Manu katho mi ngaikha mipui maikuungnga ranru, khawakha e-inchu aleiilaak ngaikhan num china nei-inte.

Khawale inruoiya hiwa minchuna ngaihi kei'n nangnadiang Pathian khat-um Christa Jisu khat-um inthiang marwaan tirton ngai maikuungnga tuteii diang nachuonthona rakip ah mimeel mimai enlekleiya khat-um mikarathiat thomaro tia chongpena kananei.
Miring inkhat diang Pumi chuon minthonasik beiya inmani chungnga kutduongnga peluut nasik-ah innot emaro. Halli miring inkhat manu rakip chuonna nang inchelmaro, napumkha inthiangnga daro.
Halli tui khabit inkhai maro, ajarchu nang in nanaliip jarra nabak na-in intumnasik ah theibomju lekkhat kha um inro.
Mi lekkhat manu ngai khachu musik ah abeitek, halli inmani manu ngaikha inmani neek ah chongtanna munkhan aleitung masajei, takkha mi lekkha manu ngai khachu nuk ah inmusik eii.
Hiwale in-angrip ah akatha chuontho khachu inlarpong, halli inlarmak ah kaom ngaikha um thupthei nunujei.
